page.title: 03Transport
page.content: The roads around our 'D' block are not very wide so that when lorries go by there is very little room for anything else and you have to stop and go one at a time. Often there deep potholes that should be filled in. There are a lot of lorries because we have several quarries in the area and also lorries fetch the grain from the farms after it has been harvested. In{ {winter}the {roads}are very{bad}as they easily become{blocked with snowdrifts up to{14 feet high.}The only{main road is the{B4077}from {Tewkesbury}to{Stow {on the Wold.}The nearest {motorway} isthe {M5}at Tewkesbury and the nearest{Railway Station}is at {Moreton {in Marsh.}We have a bus to{Cheltenham and back daily and one to {Moreton {market}every{ Tuesday.}
